thread.section_title: Hotel Mathis - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A real gem
thread.title_full: A real gem - Review of Hotel Mathis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 279jackie1948
title: A real gem
text:
We spent 3 nights at this delightful hotel. Our room was well equipped, quiet, even though it looked on to the street,and very comfortable in every respect. As other travellers have mentioned, the hotel is well placed for getting around the city, with 2 Metro stations close by. There are many bars, cafes and restaurants within a stones throw of the Hotel, and the Reception staff were very helpful with their recommendations of places to eat.
Ala in all, we were very happy at Hotel Mathis, and anticipate returning next year.
Room Tip: We were in Room 43, on the 4th floor, and we had a tiny terrace with table and chairs. We would try... See more room tips
